557910.name: Tales Demo
557910.description:
Take a look at Tales! Join Alfred in this short demo as he finds himself outside the city gates of Uruk.

Tales is a brand new point and click adventure by Ape Marina, with a charming story, featuring full English voice acting and an original soundtrack to keep you entertained for many hours. Get a copy on Steam for even more fun with achievements and trading cards!

This short demo will give you a glimpse at what can be expected from the full game. Many features have been disabled for the demo.

Thanks for trying Tales!
557910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
